title: Lily Allen and Stranger Things' David Harbour kiss at basketball game
text:
Lily and David attended a preseason basketball game for the New York Kicks and New Orleans Pelicans at Madison Square Garden (Picture: Getty Images)

Lily Allen and Stranger Things actor David Harbour looked smitten as they packed on the PDA while enjoying a date night in New York City.

The new lovebirds were seen at a preseason basketball game for the New York Knicks and New Orleans Pelicans at Madison Square Garden, and they couldn’t help but pucker up among the action.

Lily looked comfortable and casual in a grey knitted jumper paired with blue ripped jeans, while David sported a black shirt with dark trousers, with his hair tied back in a bun.

At times the two appeared to be joking and laughing among the crowds, before they eventually leaned in for a kiss, without a care in the world.

The two have been looking very loved up as of lately, and it’s not the first time they were seen having a smooch in public, after they were spotted sharing a kiss while out and about on the streets of New York City earlier in the week.

Lily had flown out to support the Stranger Things star, who plays Hopper in the Netflix series, as he hosted Saturday Night Live, with the couple later deciding to take a stroll along the nearby streets, before stopping for a quick hug and kiss.

The singer later shared a photo of her cuddling up to her beau to Instagram as he prepared for his SNL set, captioning it ‘Mine’.

Lily and David appeared to be laughing and joking (Picture: Getty Images)

So that pretty much confirms they are official then.

It wasn’t long until they went in for a kiss (Picture: Getty Images)

The pair sparked rumours of a romance after they were first seen leaving a London theatre together in August, before they later attended the Hughie Fury vs Alexander Povetkin boxing match at the O2 Arena.

Lily was previously with DJ Meridian Dan, before the two called it quits on their relationship back in January.

Prior to him, the 34-year-old was married to Sam Cooper, with the pair tying the knot in 2011, before announcing their divorce in 2016. They share their two daughters together, six-year-old Marnie Rose and seven-year-old Ethel Mary.

Meanwhile, David is believed to have split from Fantastic Beasts actress Alison Sudol earlier in the year.

He previously dated Riviera star Julia Stiles between 2011 and 2015, and before that, he was engaged to Forgetting Sarah Marshall actress Maria Thayer.
